sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { scrollToSection } from '../utils/scrollUtils'; import '../styles/Hero.css'; const Hero = () => { const [downloadSuccess, setDownloadSuccess] = useState(false); const downloadResume = () => { // Create a more detailed resume content const resumeHTML = ` Esha Abinaya Sree M - Resume

ESHA ABINAYA SREE M

Email: eshaabinayasree@gmail.com

Phone: +91 9894032886

LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/esha-abinaya-sree

GitHub: github.com/Eshaabinayasree

Location: Tirunelveli, Tamil Nadu, India

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY

Aspiring Information Technology graduate with hands-on experience in backend development, REST API engineering, database handling, and data analytics. Strong foundation in Java, JavaScript, Python, and SQL with experience in Node.js and full-stack development. Adept at debugging, clean coding, and collaborating in team environments. Seeking to contribute to high-impact engineering teams.

EDUCATION

Francis Xavier Engineering College

B.Tech Information Technology - 80%

November 2022 - April 2026 | Tirunelveli, Tamil Nadu, India

Sri Ramakrishna Matric Hr Sec School

Higher Secondary Education - 85%

June 2021 - May 2022 | Tenkasi, Tamil Nadu, India

TECHNICAL SKILLS

Programming Languages

C, Python, JavaScript, Java, Go

Backend Development

REST APIs, Node.js, Pandas, Microservices (Basics), Spring Boot (Basics)

Frontend Development

React.js, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap

Tools & Technologies

Linux, VS Code, Git, MySQL, PostgreSQL

WORK EXPERIENCE

Node.js Development Intern

Digisailor, Tirunelveli

July 2024

  • Built RESTful APIs integrated with MySQL for CRUD operations
  • Developed backend logic using Node.js for data processing
  • Debugged performance issues and collaborated using Git & VS Code

Database Learning Intern

Eval Benches Technologies, Tuticorin

May 2024

  • Wrote optimized SQL queries for reporting and data analysis
  • Designed normalized schemas and performance-tuned databases
  • Performed data cleansing, validation, and transformation using SQL & Excel

PROJECTS

Air Quality Forecasting System

Technologies: Python, Pandas, Matplotlib

  • Developed real-time air quality dashboard with forecasting models
  • Implemented machine learning algorithms for prediction

Stock Price Prediction

Technologies: Python, Pandas, Scikit-learn

  • Built ML model predicting stock trends using time series data
  • Achieved accurate predictions through data preprocessing and feature engineering

Path Finder - Wearable Tracker

Technologies: GPS Module, Ultrasonic Sensors, Arduino

  • Created IoT safety wearable with GPS tracking and obstacle detection
  • Integrated emergency alert system for user safety

CERTIFICATIONS

  • Python Development and Data Science - Udemy
  • Build a Computer Vision App with Cognitive Services - Microsoft

CORE COMPETENCIES

  • Technical: Data Structures & Algorithms, Object-Oriented Programming, System Design Basics, Distributed Systems Basics
  • Software Engineering: Debugging, Clean Code Practices, Testing, Working with Large Codebases
  • Soft Skills: Communication, Analytical Thinking, Adaptability, Time Management
`; // Create blob and download as HTML (which can be opened in browser and saved as PDF) const blob = new Blob([resumeHTML], { type: 'text/html' }); const url = window.URL.createObjectURL(blob); const link = document.createElement('a'); link.href = url; link.download = 'Esha_Abinaya_Sree_Resume.html'; document.body.appendChild(link); link.click(); document.body.removeChild(link); window.URL.revokeObjectURL(url); setDownloadSuccess(true); setTimeout(() => setDownloadSuccess(false), 3000); }; return (

Esha Abinaya Sree M

Backend Developer & Data Enthusiast

Building scalable systems, one API at a time

I'm passionate about backend development and data analytics. I enjoy crafting efficient REST APIs, optimizing databases, and solving real-world problems through code. Currently exploring microservices and distributed systems while working on exciting projects.

{ e.target.src = "https://github.com/Eshaabinayasree.png"; }} />
); }; export default Hero;
